Worked perfect... 

If you dont know what to do with the files: 

First you need to download the newest version of Winrar, just search on google. Then select all the .rar files and only the rar files and extract them somewhere. 

Now you should have 3 bin files and 3 cue files. I used "Daemon tools" to and mounted the cue files and installed it direct from my computer. 

Just search google for Daemon tools, you can also burn the bin/cue files with Nero if youwant.

okay ppl heres what u do to get it to work(altho i do not recomend this game anyways, its really bad)
1. mount H4_DISK1.cue (using daemontools, if u dont have it, google "daemontools download")
2. Install, and switch to H4_DISK2.cue, when its requested.
3. rename "H4_gath(1).cue" & "H4_gath(1).bin" to "H4_gath.cue" & "H4_gath.bin", then install using the .cue
4. now also remove the "(2)'s from "H4_WW(2).cue" & "H4_WW(2).bin" and install using the .cue
5. to play the game keep the H4_WW.cue mounted in daemontools.

i figured out that with newer versions of daemon tools the game install won't run.The solution is to downgrade your current version of daemon tools(for me worked with daemon tools 4.0.6 and didn't with 4.0.8)

heres the all patches(and latest)
http://patches.ubi.com/heroes_might_magic_4/
you cant install the latest patch first, you gotta install them all and start with "heroes_4_v1.0_to_v1.2_us.exe"


---------

youll need a program to mount with such as daemon tools or poweriso, this is if your not planning on burning to cd/dvd's... when  you get the program you shall mount the bin files, when you mount the program creates a fake cd drive... and the bin files are fake cd's....

when your done installing(remember where you installed the game),
mount H4_DISK2.bin and locate to the drive with "this computer" or "explorer" and go to the map "Crack" then copy the "heroes4.exe" file to the map where you installed the game, default is "C:\Program\3DO\Heroes of Might and Magic IV" and it will ask you if its ok to overwrite, just click yes and then enjoy =D
